text: This is the first international school my son ever attended that builds confidence, forms best impressions and makes all kids feel valued and supported. Adherence to the best values helps kids develop a global mindset,   build friendships, help those in need - it's exactly the environment you want the kid to develop within. Thanks to wise leadership and forward thinking strategy, the school has grown fast, got Cambridge accredited and onboarded the best teachers. If I had to choose, I'd select it as an entire kindergarten through university school for my child, the decision you'd never regret.

Top Singapore international school. High Quality academics, unbelievably cheap for a Singapore International School at $12k pa, less than a kindergarten! Really awesome! Thank you KBH for all that you do to make international schooling high quality yet affordable in Singapore. Amazing!
#Singaporeinternationalschool #Singaporeaffordableinternationalschool
#Singaporetopinternationalschool
Wonderful caring environment. Kids receive nurturing, individual attention and commendable academic outcomes.  My children have truly thrived here.  Highly recommended.
Founder has pour their soul and attention to ensure fair education for all

What I love about Knight Bridge School is that it's not just a place for students to learn; it's like a home. You can see the diversity, equality, and the love that the teachers show to their students.
